boardgame.name: Ballon Cup
Ballonrace
Balloon Cup
벌룬컵
boardgame.description: In Balloon Cup, the players compete in several short balloon flights (hops) to collect the colored cubes associated with each hop. Four landscape cards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; two plains alternating with two mountains _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; are laid out, and 1, 2, 3, or 4 cubes in assorted colors (gray, blue, green, yellow, red) are added to these cards. From a hand of eight balloon cards, you must try to pass each landscape by adding cards matching the colored blocks onto their side of table, although winds (and cunning) may occasionally cause them to play on their opponent's side _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; a move that can really ruin the opponent's plans._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;High-valued balloons are played on the mountains, and low-valued balloons are played on the plains. Whoever is the better balloonist takes the cubes from the card, which is then flipped over _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; mountains becomes plains and vice-versa _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and refilled with cubes. Five trophy cards of value 3 to 7 are placed at the top of the cards. When a player has collected enough cubes of a given color, he earns the trophy card for that color. Players may even trade three otherwise useless cubes for one they can use. The first player to earn three trophy cards is the winner!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2003 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Two-players

999 Games - Ballonrace Language: Dutch Players: 2 Age: 8+ Duration: about 30 min Weight: 0.290 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: In Balloon Cup, the players compete in several short balloon flights (hops) to collect the colored cubes associated with each hop. Four landscape cards, two Plains alternating with two Mountains, are laid out and 1, 2, 3 or 4 cubes in assorted colors (gray, blue, green, yellow, red) are added. From a hand of 8 Balloon cards must try to pass each landscape by adding cards matching the colored blocks onto their side of table, although winds (and cunning) may occasionally cause them to play on their opponent’s side - a move that can really ruin the opponent’s plans. High-valued balloons are played on the Mountains and low-valued balloons on the plains. Whoever is the better balloonist takes the cubes from the card, which is then flipped over and refilled with cubes. Mountains becomes Plains and vice-versa. 5 Trophy cards of value 3 to 7 are placed at the top of the cards. When a player has collected enough cubes of a given color, he earns the Trophy card for that color. Players may even trade 3 otherwise useless cubes for 1 they can use. The first player to earn 3 trophy cards is the winner! See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

High-valued balloons are played on the Mountains and low-valued balloons on the plains. Whoever is the better balloonist takes the cubes from the card, which is then flipped over and refilled with cubes. Mountains becomes Plains and vice-versa. 5 Trophy cards of value 3 to 7 are placed at the top of the cards. When a player has collected enough cubes of a given color, he earns the Trophy card for that color. Players may even trade 3 otherwise useless cubes for 1 they can use. The first player to earn 3 trophy cards is the winner! See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 7 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: 1) Paypal Instant Transfer - 2.9% + $0.30 processing fee applies (funded by existing funds or bank account) 2) Money Order - We will accept postal money orders but will not ship until we have received and cashed the money order. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. I will only charge the actual USPS or Fed Ex (your choice) shipping price (lowest possible) with delivery confirmation for the game. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. The game has been played but is in excellent condition. All the cards are sleeved. Feel free to browse through my other games for sale in the marketplace. I will be glad to combine orders to save on shipping.
